title: Alphabet's Earnings Surge Expected — TradingView News
text: Alphabet Inc., the parent company of Google, closed at $144.08 in the latest trading session, marking a slight decrease of -0.11% from the prior day. This follows a previous close at $142.47, with a move of -0.13% from the day before that. The financial community is closely monitoring Alphabet's performance as it prepares for its upcoming earnings report. The company is expected to report an Earnings Per Share (EPS) of $1.62, which would represent a significant increase of 54.29% compared to the same quarter of the previous year. In terms of revenue, a figure of $70.59 billion is predicted, indicating an 11.83% increase compared to the same quarter of the previous year. Analysts have recently revised their estimates for Alphabet, reflecting the latest near-term business trends. These upward revisions express a positive outlook on the company's business operations and its ability to generate profits. Traders and investors use our platform.
